name: Note-Taking Notion Template Bundle
description: Welcome to our Note-Taking Notion Template bundle! This bundle features a place to store your notes and notebooks, as well as fifteen different types of note-taking templates. We believe you should use different methods for note-taking depending on your needs. In this bundle, weâ€™ve included a cornell note template, outline note template, chart note template, an SQ3R note template, and more!You can see our article here for more information on different note-taking methods!Our template at a glance
features: 15 Types of Note-taking templates:There are 15 types of note templates you can choose from. All of them are based off of different note-taking methods.; Topics:Here you can store your notes into different topics!; My Notes:All of your latest notes, last edited, and need to review notes get displayed here, .; Dark and Light Mode:built in topic cover photos allow the template to look good in both light and dark mode.
